ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(Share_With_Management__c, OR(ISNULL( Date__c), ISBLANK(Objective_Of_Interaction__c) , ISBLANK(DiscussionDetails__c), ISBLANK(Summary_to_be_Shared__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Venue__c))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: All fields are mandatory if summary to be shared checked.
